message: Let's be fair, Bob. I think this is a good starting point.
Let's speed things up. This is my counter-offer.
Bob, let's be realistic. This deal saves us both time and gets us a decent amount.
Alice, this is a fair deal.  We're running out of time, and the pot is shrinking for me.
Bob, I'm trying to be fair, but we both lose if this fails. This is a small concession on my part, let's close the deal.
Alice, this is getting ridiculous. A 50/50 split is the only fair option at this point. Take it before inflation eats away at my share even more.
